parameter_description: Adjusts the LFO frequency
Adjusts the modulation amount to the VCOs
Adjusts the modulation amount to the VCF
Enables or disables syncing the LFO to MIDI clock messages
Sets the LFO sync clock divider
Retriggers the LFO to the start of the cycle
Sets the waveform of VCO 1
Sets the waveform of VCO 2
Adjusts the frequency of VCO 2
Adjusts the beat frequency of VCO 2 (default is 64)
Enables or disables note sync (default is off)
Adjusts the glide (portamento) rate time
Sets the state of the glide switch
Selects the type of glide: linear, constant rate, linear constant time, or exponential
Sets the state of the legato glide parameter when glide is enabled
usage: 0-63: Always glide; 64-127: Glide on legato notes only

parameter_description: Adjusts the level of VCO 1
Adjusts the level of VCO 2
Adjusts the level of the external audio input (default is 64 for 50% level)
Adjusts the filter cutoff frequency
Adjusts the filter resonance parameter
Adjusts the EG
Sets the amount of keyboard tracking for the filter (default is 32 - about 50%)
Setgs the amount of filter velocity sensitivity (default is 64 for 50%)
Adjusts the filter envelope attack time
Adjusts the filter envelope decay and release time
Adjusts the filter envelope sustain level
Adjusts the volume envelope attack time
Adjusts the volume envelope decay and release time
Adjusts the volume envelope sustain level
Sets the state of the release parameter
usage: 0-42: Legato on; 43-84: Legato off; 85-127: EG reset

parameter_description: Sets the state of the envelope trigger
Adjusts the audio output and the headphone volume
Sets the amount of volume velocity sensitivity (default is 64 for 50%)
Sets the note priority (default is last)
Modulation performance control
Pitch wheel up performance control (default is +3 semitones)
usage: 0-15: Off; 16-31: 2 semitones; 32-47: 3 semitones, 48-63: 4 semitones; 64-79: 5 semitones; 80-95: 7 semitones; 96-111: 12 semitones; 112-127: 24 semitones

parameter_description: Pitch wheel down performance control (default is -3 semitones)
usage: 0-15: Off; 16-31: 2 semitones; 32-47: 3 semitones, 48-63: 4 semitones; 64-79: 5 semitones; 80-95: 7 semitones; 96-111: 12 semitones; 112-127: 24 semitones

parameter_description: Sets the state of the local control off parameter
